channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: This Belkin charging case for the Switch 2 has a screen for checking battery life
item.description: Belkin just introduced the appropriately-named Charging Case Pro for Nintendo Switch 2 at CES. This is a high-end charging case specifically designed for Nintendo's latest console. The 10,000mAh power bank delivers up to 30W of fast charging, which is a decent enough metric. I'm more excited, however, about the bells and whistles. The Charging Case Pro boasts an LCD screen on the exterior, making it easy to keep track of remaining battery life. It also doubles as a tabletop stand, which is always nice. The built-in Switch 2 stand is better than what we got with the first Switch, but it's still...

item.title: You can charge the battery in Belkin’s new Switch 2 power case without opening it
item.description: Belkin has announced a new version of one of its first accessories for the Switch 2 at CES 2026. The Charging Case Pro for Nintendo Switch 2 carries forward the same 10,000mAh internal battery as the original, but it's been redesigned so you don't need to remove the battery to charge it, and you no […]

item.title: Belkin’s new 3-in-1 charging dock isn’t limited to the Apple Watch
item.description: As convenient as 3-in-1 chargers can be, the vast majority of them work with a variety of smartphones and wireless earbuds, but only support one wearable: the Apple Watch. That's what sets the UltraCharge Modular Charging Dock that Belkin just announced at CES 2026 apart. Its design can accommodate different smartwatches, but you'll need to […]

item.title: Belkin’s new HDMI adapter wirelessly connects to screens over 130 feet away
item.description: Belkin has announced a new wireless display adapter that works without the need for a Wi-Fi network. The ConnectAir Wireless HDMI Display Adapter includes a USB-C transmitter you connect to devices like laptops, tablets, and phones, and an HDMI receiver that plugs into a display. You don't need to install drivers or stick to compatible […]

item.title: Plaud updates the NotePin with a button
item.description: Plaud has updated its compact NotePin AI recorder. The new NotePin S is almost identical to the original, except for one major difference: a button. It's joined by a new Plaud Desktop app for recording audio in online meetings, which is free to owners of any Plaud Note or NotePin. The NotePin S has the […]

item.title: Here are my 4 most anticipated new 4K Blu-ray releases from January 2026
item.description: There are plenty of interesting 4K discs up for release in January 2026, but I've picked my 4 most anticipated ones.

item.title: Plaud's latest AI wearable has a button for flagging key moments
item.description: Plaud is back with another conversation-recording AI wearable. This one, the NotePin S, is only a minor iteration on the original NotePin. This model adds… a button.The recessed recording button replaces the squeeze-to-record mechanism on the 2024 original. A single long press starts recording. It also adds a new "press to highlight" feature. The idea is to flag what's most important in a conversation, helping the AI learn what to emphasize in its summary.Otherwise, you're getting the same package as in the first NotePin. The capsule-sized "S" model still has two microphones, weighs 0.6 ounces...

item.title: James Webb : une énergie noire variable pour résoudre le mystère de certaines galaxies
item.description: L'énergie noire ne semblait influencer vraiment l'évolution de l'Univers observable que depuis quelques milliards d'années, notamment en accélérant son expansion. Mais si on suppose qu'elle évolue elle aussi et qu'elle a influencé nettement pour cette raison l'Univers primitif, il devient...

item.title: Oppo Find X9 Pro vs Google Pixel 10 Pro XL : comment choisir le meilleur smartphone ?
item.description: Quand on a le budget, il est tout naturel d'hésiter entre plusieurs références ultra haut de gamme. Cette année, on est d'ailleurs bien servis avec les Oppo Find X9 Pro et le Google Pixel 10 Pro XL. Alors, comment bien dépenser ses deniers pour son nouveau smartphone premium ?

item.title: French and Malaysian authorities are investigating Grok for generating sexualized deepfakes
item.description: France and Malaysia have joined India in condemning Grok for creating sexualized deepfakes of women and minors.

item.title: SwitchBot says its humanoid household robot can do your laundry
item.description: SwitchBot is bringing a new household robot to CES 2026. The smart home company is launching the Onero H1, which it calls "the most accessible AI household robot." The announcement follows last year's debut of its multitasking household bot - a robot vacuum mounted to a mobile platform. SwitchBot says the Onero is a general-use […]

item.title: You can unlock SwitchBot’s first deadbolt smart lock with your face
item.description: SwitchBot has announced a new deadbolt smart lock that can be unlocked with a glance. Like the Keypad Vision that SwitchBot launched last year, the new Lock Vision series unveiled at CES uses 3D facial recognition technology to enable "near-instant unlocking" after scanning your face. The Lock Vision is the first smart lock from SwitchBot […]

item.title: SwitchBot’s new E Ink display seems great for weather nerds
item.description: One of SwitchBot's most interesting products announced at CES 2026 is one of its most basic. The Weather Station, as it's called, is a 7.5-inch framed E Ink screen that's packed with weather-related data. Its interface shows info including the date, time, weather, a six-day weather forecast, and when the sunrise and sunset will happen, […]

item.title: SwitchBot’s AI audio recorder is a ‘second brain’ for memories
item.description: SwitchBot is joining the AI voice recorder bandwagon, introducing its own clip-on gadget that captures and organizes your every conversation. The SwitchBot AI MindClip announced at CES records spoken information from your daily life and work meetings and converts those conversations into summaries, to-do actions, and a personal audio memory database. This announcement follows competing […]...

item.title: SwitchBot’s AI-powered desk light looks like a pixel-art snow globe
item.description: SwitchBot's new RGB desk light lets you put a teeny version of the Las Vegas Sphere in your home. The AI-powered Obboto lamp announced at CES is described by SwitchBot as an "expressive globe light companion" that can display preset animations and user-uploaded images and GIFs as pixel art, giving you a fun, customizable desktop […]

item.title: Motorola’s first book-style foldable leaks
item.description: The Motorola Razr Fold is reportedly coming soon, according to prolific leaker Evan Blass. Details are scant at the moment. All the info we have is based on a single slide from a marketing deck that talks up the Fold's camera system and displays, and squeezes in a mention of AI for good measure before […]

item.title: Plaud launches a new AI pin and a desktop meeting notetaker
item.description: Plaud is going after the likes of Granola to launch a desktop app that records online meetings

item.title: Garmin HRM 600 : cette ceinture cardio noté 8/10 va plaire aux sportifs exigeants, surtout avec 22 % de moins
item.description: Avec ses nombreux atouts dont ce module amovible, cette Garmin HRM 600 va rapidement devenir un indispensable de tous vos entraînements et, bonne nouvelle, sur Amazon, vous pourrez la trouver à 131,89 euros au lieu de 169 euros, mais uniquement sur les modèles M et XL.

item.title: How to watch the Samsung 'First Look' CES 2026 presentation
item.description: NurPhoto via Getty Images Samsung is arguably the 800-pound gorilla of CES, since many of the other consumer tech titans — Apple, Google, Microsoft, Meta, Amazon — either no longer have a presence, or have never shown up to begin with. In the past, that's given Samsung free range to bow a full spectrum of products that range from phones and computers to refrigerators, AI assistants and rolling robots. But for CES 2026, the company is switching things up a bit: Instead of its longtime midday Monday press conference, the Korean giant will take the lead of the show with a Sunday night presentatio...

item.title: CES 2026: The biggest tech trends to watch out for
item.description: This year's Consumer Electronics Show will have plenty to talk about in terms of displays, chips, and robots. Here are the tech trends to expect.

item.title: What to expect from Samsung at CES 2026
item.description: Samsung is bringing a ton of new tech to this year's CES.

item.title: The AndaSeat Kaiser 3E XL might be one of the best value gaming chairs today
item.description: AndaSeat's Kaiser 3E XL mixes affordability with comfort, resulting in a fantastically priced chair that's comfortable and ergonomic.

item.title: ‘The Witcher 3’ May Have One More Adventure Left In It
item.description: Players and analysts are sure CDPR has cooked up something for 'The Witcher 3' that also sets the stage for ' The Witcher 4.'

item.title: XReal AR glasses get an upgrade and price drop in time for CES 2026
item.description: XReal debuts the 1S AR glasses, which is cheaper than its other models.
